title: Steve-O
itunes:title: Steve-O
description:
Steve-O [The Jackass movies, Wildboyz] talks with Anna about the newly released Jackass Forever, how a broken heart and video camera led to his unique career, the idea of legacy and immortality, meditating for 41 minutes a day, how he tracked down and met Motley Crue at age 13, dating responsibly, his dream of establishing an animal sanctuary, the Steve-O Bucket List comedy tour, and a lot more. 


This episode’s Unqualified segment begins with a call from Lizzie who, after finally setting a date for her wedding, was blind-sided when her older sister spontaneously scheduled her own wedding just weeks prior. Next, Anna and Steve-O talk with Paula whose 19-year-old son met a girl on-line then unexpectedly moved across the country to be with her.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
